posts.post_content:
Still hoping to find one out there for sale... please email me if you have one, or know of someone who might be willing to part with one..

thanks

Jamie

hi Jamie-
how many are known to exist?
best wishes on your hunt :)

2 are graded... i know where one is..but unlikely to work out a deal as it is that collectors favorite card... .. so im hunting for the other example... or possibly any more which might be ungraded in a collection..

great to hear from you mark.. hope all is well!
